skill.name: behaviors.skills.primitives.Reinforce
skill.description:
For an agent to move toward another agent, and reinforce it.
The target unit won't be reinforced if it cannot be reached. In that specific case, the feeback 'failed' is sent.
Because the action of reinforcing another agent is "permanent" (reinforcement is effective until the action is triggered), this skill never sends the feedback "done", but only a feedback that gives the information that reinforcement is a success.

link.name: reach
link.description: To enact the decision to "reach" the entity.

link.name: reinforce
link.description: To enact the decision to reinforce the entity once it is reached.

feedback.name: reinforcing
feedback.description: Sent once the agent is reinforcing the entity.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if agent cannot reinforce the target parameter.
